content: easy free crochet baby cardigan pattern 1 i x ball of 100g cygnet aran used for this project the finished chest size is 18inches around 0-3 months preemie - i have also made this using red heart lisa cream dk with a 3 5mm hook i crochet extremely loosley you may need to to go a hook to achieve sizing full patterns is here 1 1 https //crochet-patterns-free com/baby-cardigan-crochet-pattern-free/
